commit.message: Avoid the overflow with rustc+debugassertions in issue-44406

files.patch:
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@ LL |         bar {  }
 help: if `bar` is a function, use the arguments directly
    |
 LL -         bar(baz: $rest)
-LL +         bar(true);
+LL +         bar(: $rest)
    | 
 
 error: aborting due to 2 previous errors
